rules.comment: This example shows how to create a permission that can be used to grant administrative privileges over the 'SaaS-Applications' workspace. In this case, this permission is allowing the user dtijerina-workspaceadministrator@privcloud.com or the application app-integration-workspaceadministrator these privileges. Once this permissions is created, it needs to be assigned to a role and then the role granted to dtijerina-workspaceadministrator@privcloud.com or the application app-integration-workspaceadministrator.
